attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, disagree with the biased and liberal way the BBC is used by this Government, not only to report world events, but also to report and manipulate the state of the United Kingdom.
The BBC is biased,liberal in its thinking and down right racist/homophobic & paranoid to its core.
We would hate to think that someone actually got their job on educational merits instead of how liberal their views are.
For Example:
Panarama was apalling about Iraqi torture, not once did we see a service persons family talking about the loss of their son/brother/daughter.
Or how about this dross:
Dawn goes Lesbian/Dawn gets a baby?
(perhaps she should find someone thats wants to spend their life with her instead of the crap she is turning out).
Little Britian, now there's a laugh! we feel that it ran its course somewhere around the second season, (if that for some of us).Its absolute tosh, the same old halfwit characters wheeled out, that have become about as funny as septic piles.
This is not about race/colour or creed, its about the BBC 'PC' drivel we are fed everyday.
Only when the BBC joins the real world & not being funded by an unjust tax will we actually get what we as a nation pay for.
